mapper.delete: /* deleteCalendar */ DELETE FROM calendar WHERE id = #{value};
mapper.select: /* findCalendarByDay */ SELECT * FROM calendar AS C LEFT JOIN event_share AS ES ON ES.event_id = C.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(C.start_at, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{date} AND(C.user_id = #{userId} OR ES.shared_user_id = #{userId})

/* findCalendarByDay */ SELECT * FROM calendar AS C LEFT JOIN event_share AS ES ON ES.shred_user_id = C.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(C.start_at, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m') AND(C.user_id = #{userId} OR ES.shared_user_id = #{userId})
